name: Administrative Services
description: People with roles in administration. Examples include: secretary, administrative assistant, office manager, office assistant, apartment locator, personal assistant, branch manager, etc.

name: Architecture and Engineering
description: People with roles in architecture and engineering. Examples include: software engineer, technician, electrician, machinist, etc.

name: Arts, Entertainment, Sports and Media
description: People with roles in arts, entertainment, sports and media. Examples include: photographer, artist, actor, actress, singer, etc.

name: Business and Finance
description: People with roles in business and finance. Examples include: accountant, accounting manager, auditor, sales manager, financial advisor, chief financial officer, dealer, agent, etc.

name: Cleaning and Maintenance Services
description: People with roles in cleaning and maintenance. Examples include: janitor, housekeeper, gardener, handyman, etc.

name: Community and Social Services
description: People with roles in community and social services. Examples include: minister, social worker, counselor, politician, etc.

name: Computation and Mathematics
description: People with roles in computation and mathematics. Examples include: computer scientist, analyst, mathematician, etc.

name: Construction and Extraction
description: People with roles in construction and extraction. Examples include: service technician, electrician, brick layer, mechanic, machine operator, etc.

name: Education and Libraries
description: People with roles in education or libraries. Examples include: educator, instructor, teacher, professor, lecturer, research assistant, tutor, librarian, principal, etc.

name: Farming, Fishing and Forestry
description: People with roles in farming, fishing and forestry. Examples include: farmer, rider, crew member, handyman, etc.

name: Food and Restaurants
description: People with roles in food and restaurants. Examples include: cashier, server, waiter, waitress, chef, barista, line cook, etc.

name: Government Employees (Global)
description: People with roles in the government

name: Healthcare and Medical Services
description: People with roles in healthcare and medical services. Examples include: physician, dentist, cardiologist, etc.

name: IT and Technical Services
description: People with roles in IT and technical services. Examples include: IT technician, web developer, IT consultant, etc.

name: Installation and Repair Services
description: People with roles in installation and repair services. Examples include: technician, operator, mechanic, welder, etc.

name: Legal Services
description: People with roles in legal services. Examples include: lawyer, corporate counsel, partner, paralegal, etc.

name: Life, Physical and Social Sciences
description: People with roles in life, physical and social sciences. Examples include: professor, chemist, psychologist, geologist, etc.

name: Management
description: People with roles in management. Examples include: manager, supervisor, director, president, chairman, etc.

name: Military (Global)
description: People with active roles in the military

name: Production
description: People with roles in production. Examples include: miner, blacksmith, lumberjack, etc.

name: Protective Services
description: People with roles in protective services. Examples include: security guard, sergeant, life guard, police officer, firefighter, etc.

name: Sales
description: People with roles in sales. Examples include: sales assistant, retail manager, realtor, consultant, customer service representative, cashier, etc.

name: Transportation and Moving
description: People with roles in transportation and moving. Examples include: Driver, operator, sea captain, flight attendant, pilot, etc.

name: Veterans (US)
description: People who were previously employed by the US military

description: People with an anniversary in 61-90 days

raw_name: Close friends of people engaged with Ramadan content
name: Close friends of people engaged with Ramadan content
description: Top 2 friends of anyone that has high or medium engagement with Ramadan month content. Excludes people that engaged with Ramadan content

name: Ramadan month (high content engagement)
description: People who engaged with content related to Ramadan month over the past 90 days

name: Ramadan month (medium content engagement)
description: People who engaged with content related to Ramadan month over the past 90 days

name: Friends of Soccer fans
description: Top 2 friends of anyone that is a moderately or highly engaged football (US soccer) fan. Excludes people that are already football fans.

name: Soccer fans (high content engagement)
description: Interacted with content related to football (US soccer) 5 or more times over the past 90 days

name: Soccer fans (moderate content engagement)
description: Interacted with content related to football (US soccer) and sports less than 5 times over the past 90 days.

name: Commuters
description: People likely commute from their home to their workplace on weekdays

name: Frequent Travelers
description: People whose activities on Facebook suggest they are frequent travelers

name: Frequent international travelers
description: People who have traveled abroad more than once in the past 6 months

name: Returned from travels 1 week ago
description: People whose activities on Facebook suggest they returned from traveling within the past week

name: Returned from travels 2 weeks ago
description: People whose activities on Facebook suggest they returned from traveling within the past 2 weeks
